backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for The Jurists backend, defining data types (Jurisdiction, LeadStatus, PracticeArea, ContactFormSubmission) and managing contact form submissions with access control, admin initialization, and CRUD operations.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report JSON file with no features recorded.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing short summaries of all frontend source files, describing each component's purpose and key implementation details.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML entry point for the React app with Google Tag Manager and AMP Analytics script tags, mounting the app at the #root div.
frontend/public/google2b25be66b928ef08.h: Google Search Console site verification file for thejurists.in.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Robots.txt allowing all crawlers full site access and pointing to the sitemap at https://thejurists.in/sitemap.xml.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: Static XML sitemap listing all public URLs for The Jurists website including home, services, blog, contact, and jurisdiction pages with priorities and change frequencies.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application component that sets up TanStack Router with all routes (home, services, blog, jurisdictions, admin pages) wrapped in ThemeProvider and ErrorBoundary.
frontend/src/components/BacklinkSubmissi: Empty component file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/Breadcrumbs.tsx: Breadcrumb navigation component that renders a linked trail with chevron separators and injects JSON-LD breadcrumb structured data for SEO.
frontend/src/components/ContactForm.tsx: Contact form component that embeds a Google Forms iframe for consultation requests, defaulting to a pre-configured form URL with luxury card styling.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: React class-based error boundary that catches rendering errors and displays a styled error UI with options to retry or navigate home.
frontend/src/components/FAQSection.tsx: Accordion-based FAQ section component that renders a list of questions/answers and injects FAQ JSON-LD structured data for SEO.
frontend/src/components/FloatingAdminBut: Empty component file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with branding, contact info, and navigation links for quick links, services, and jurisdictions (Hyderabad, Secunderabad, Rangareddy, Cyberabad).
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky site header with navigation links, a jurisdictions dropdown, Internet Identity login/logout, and conditional admin/initialize links based on authentication and admin status.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Root layout component that wraps page content with the Header and Footer, rendering child routes via an Outlet.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal dialog that prompts a newly authenticated user to enter their name and saves the profile using the useSaveCallerUserProfile mutation.
frontend/src/components/SEOHead.tsx: Headless component that dynamically updates document title, meta description, canonical link, Open Graph, and Twitter Card tags via useEffect.
frontend/src/components/StructuredData.t: Injects JSON-LD structured data scripts into the document head and exports helper functions for generating LocalBusiness, Organization, LegalService, and Breadcrumb schemas.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor using React Query, invalidating dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an InternetIdentityProvider context and useInternetIdentity hook for managing DFINITY AuthClient login, logout, and identity state with delegation validation.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for backend actor interactions including user profile management, contact form submissions (CRUD), admin checks, and blog articles.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file configuring Tailwind base/components/utilities and defining a luxury navy-and-gold color palette via CSS custom properties for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped in QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: About page component displaying the firm's story, core values, and achievements with SEO metadata and structured data for The Jurists law firm.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Empty admin dashboard page file with no content.
frontend/src/pages/BlogDetailPage.tsx: Blog article detail page that fetches and displays a single article by ID with SEO metadata, structured data, breadcrumbs, and practice area badges.
frontend/src/pages/BlogListPage.tsx: Blog listing page that fetches and displays all blog articles in a card grid with category badges, excerpts, and navigation to individual article pages.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Contact page displaying office email, location, hours, an embedded Google Map, and a contact form with SEO metadata and local business structured data.
frontend/src/pages/GoogleVerificationPag: Empty Google verification page file with no content.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: The main landing page for The Jurists law firm, displaying a hero section, practice area cards with images, and a 'why choose us' section with SEO metadata and structured data.
frontend/src/pages/InitializeAdminPage.t: A one-time setup page that allows the first Internet Identity user to claim admin access for the platform, with status checks and automatic redirect to the leads dashboard on success.
frontend/src/pages/JurisdictionPage.tsx: A reusable page component that renders location-specific legal service information (practice areas, contact email) for each of four jurisdictions: Hyderabad, Secunderabad, Rangareddy, and Cyberabad.
frontend/src/pages/LeadsPage.tsx: An admin-only dashboard page that displays, filters, and updates the status of contact form submissions, with authentication and admin-role guards before rendering the leads table.
frontend/src/pages/ServiceDetailPage.tsx: A reusable detail page component that renders service-specific content (description, sub-services, benefits, FAQs) for each legal practice area based on a service slug prop.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Renders a grid of legal service cards (Family Law, Corporate Law, Criminal Defense, etc.) with icons, images, and links to individual service pages, plus SEO metadata and structured data.
frontend/src/pages/SitemapPage.tsx: Empty file with no content or exports defined.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utility functions for extracting URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence helpers and a function to clean sensitive params from the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with custom OKLCH-based color tokens, border radii, box shadows, spacing, and keyframe animations, using the typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata and feature request status for 'The Jurists', with one pending task to deploy the backend Motoko canister and frontend React app to the Internet Computer mainnet.
